page.title: 07Local Clubs
page.content: In the square there are at least 6 social clubs:Newburn Memorial Club;R.A.F.A.Club;Blutcher;Lemington Comrades Club;West Denton C.I.U.and Lemington Labour Club.Membership is large:it varies from1775 men and 601 women in Blutcher Social Club,to75 men and 25 women in the R.A.F.A.Club.The large majority of members in all the clubs are men."Do the lady members have a vote?"-"What do they want one for,you must be joking".All Life Members are male. In the evenings and at weekends adults go to clubs.All age groups join in such events as the Christmas parties.Both sexes are members of leek clubs,where very good prizes are won.A wide range of activities are offered at the Walbottle Evening Institute.C.H.A.D.C.A.is the focus for the community of Chapel House Estate.
